Package com.group13.tmae.controller.tournaments

Class TournamentController

java.lang.Object
com.group13.tmae.controller.tournaments.TournamentController
@Controller
@RequestMapping("/tournament")
public class TournamentController
extends java.lang.Object
Controller for handling tournament-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • saveTournament

      @PostMapping("/saveTournament") public java.lang.String saveTournament​(@ModelAttribute("tournament") Tournament tournament)
      Saves a new tournament to the database and redirects to the tournament list view.
      Parameters:
      tournament - The tournament object to save.
      Returns:
      The view name to redirect to after saving the tournament.

    • showTournamentPage

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public java.lang.String showTournamentPage​(@PathVariable("id") java.lang.Long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the tournament page for a specific tournament.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the tournament to display.
      model - The view model to pass to the front end.
      Returns:
      The name of the view to render the tournament page.

    • createEvent

      @GetMapping("/creation") public java.lang.String createEvent​(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the view for creating a new event.
      Parameters:
      model - The view model to pass to the front end.
      Returns:
      The name of the view to render the event creation page.

    • showAllTournaments

      @GetMapping("/listAllTournaments") public java.lang.String showAllTournaments​(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the list of all tournaments.
      Parameters:
      model - The view model to pass to the front end.
      Returns:
      The name of the view to render the list of all tournaments.

    • joinTournament

      @GetMapping("/joinTournament/{id}") public java.lang.String joinTournament​(@PathVariable("id") java.lang.Long tournamentID, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Registers the currently logged-in athlete to the specified tournament and redirects to the tournament list view.
      Parameters:
      tournamentID - The unique identifier of the tournament to join.
      model - The view model to pass to the front end.
      Returns:
      The name of the view to render after joining the tournament.

    • leaveTournament

      @GetMapping("/leaveTournament/{id}") public java.lang.String leaveTournament​(@PathVariable("id") java.lang.Long tournamentID)
      Withdraws the currently logged-in athlete from the specified tournament and redirects to the athlete profile view.
      Parameters:
      tournamentID - The unique identifier of the tournament to leave.
      Returns:
      The view name to redirect to after leaving the tournament.

    • updateTournament

      @PostMapping("/updateTournament") public java.lang.String updateTournament​(@ModelAttribute("tournament") Tournament tournamentInput)
      Updates an existing tournament with new information and redirects to the updated tournament's page.
      Parameters:
      tournamentInput - The tournament object with updated information.
      Returns:
      The view name to redirect to after updating the tournament.

    • kickAthlete

      @GetMapping("/{tournamentID}/kickathlete/{athleteID}") public java.lang.String kickAthlete​(@PathVariable("athleteID") java.lang.Long athleteID, @PathVariable("tournamentID") java.lang.Long tournamentID)
      Handles the removal of an athlete from a tournament.
      Parameters:
      athleteID - The unique identifier of the athlete to be removed from the tournament.
      tournamentID - The unique identifier of the tournament from which the athlete is being removed.
      Returns:
      A redirection to the tournament's information page after performing the removal.
